term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - fragment ion in mass spectrometry
term.title: fragment ion

item.text: An electrically charged dissociation product of an ionic fragmentation. Such an ion may dissociate further to form other electrically charged molecular or atomic moieties of successively lower formula weight.
